address: Xã Hải Tân, Huyện Hải Hậu, Tỉnh Nam Định
thought:
**Determining the New Ward for the Given Address**

Okay, let's break this down. Someone wants to know the new administrative unit (ward) for the old address "Xã Hải Tân, Huyện Hải Hậu, Tỉnh Nam Định".  My initial thought is, this seems straightforward enough.

First things first: I identify the old province, "Tỉnh Nam Định". Now, I need to check for any province-level reorganizations using relevant resolutions, specifically those related to merges or splits.

I quickly check the pertinent resolutions (I have these readily available in my knowledge base) and find that "Tỉnh Nam Định" was, in fact, merged with other provinces to form "Tỉnh Ninh Bình".  So, "Tỉnh Ninh Bình" is the new province.

Next, I need to focus on the ward itself: "Xã Hải Tân".  I'll scour the "Other resolutions" for any directives regarding "Xã Hải Tân" within the context of "Tỉnh Ninh Bình". My experience tells me that specific reorganizations, particularly at the ward level, are usually documented in dedicated resolutions.

Bingo! Resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15 pops up.  A closer look at line 47 of this resolution confirms my suspicion. It explicitly states that the areas of "Xã Hải Tân" were merged with two other wards to form a new ward, "Xã Hải Tiến".  This is exactly what I was looking for.

To verify, I double-check the "New wards" list within my database. There it is: "Xã Hải Tiến", with the corresponding code "14218" and the province name, "Tỉnh Ninh Bình". Perfect match!

Based on this, I'll confidently generate the output. It will include: the new province name ("Tỉnh Ninh Bình"), the new ward name ("Xã Hải Tiến"), the ward code ("14218"), the specific citation of Resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 47, and a "high" confidence level because this is a direct, clear match. My knowledge of administrative reorganization processes tells me this will be an accurate answer.

citation.header: 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Ninh Bình
citation.line: 47. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Cồn, xã Hải Sơn và xã Hải Tân thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Hải Tiến.
